content: the stormy day shawl in scheepjes whirl by kirsten ballering 1 by using just one ball of yarn you can create a beautifully draped and interesting shawl the stormy day shawl is one of many designs published by scheepjes yarns in their yarn - the after party booklets released with a new design every 2 weeks the after party pattern is available in dutch english both uk and us swedish german norwegian spanish and danish the pattern is also available in print form from scheepjes stockists dutch & english **finished shawl size** 150cm wide and 70cm deep 60in x 27 5in **yarn requirements** - 1 skein scheepjes whirl green tea tipple 754 this pattern is suitable for beginners dit patroon is beschikbaar in het nederlands bij aankoop scheepjes has full copyright for this pattern for pattern support please mail to design@debondtbv nl 1 https //haakmaarraak nl
